mantis_monitor.formatter

Formatters

mantis_monitor.formatter.formatter

This file is part of the Mantis data collection suite.

mantis_monitor.formatter.formatter.Formatter()

This is the generic form for a formatter; use as an interface Note all formatters begin in the native representation This is currently Python Pandas DataFrames

This file is part of the Mantis data collection suite.
